caption: Dr. Elara glides through the lecture hall, her deep red velvet blazer grazing the Christmas tree’s glittering branches as she hands out wrapped gifts to wide-eyed students. ❄️✨ The warm glow of fairy lights dances across her full lips, hinting at the festive tension beneath the academic facade. #ProfessorVibes #ChristmasMagic #SexyScholar 🎄📚
